name: domain_data
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool website_analyze_and_seo_audit_pro.
Tool description: Analyze website and get seo audit report and speed report , onpage and offpage reports, informations about domain , hosting and more
API description: Retrieves domain information for a given website using the Website Analyze and SEO Audit Pro API.

website.description: The URL of the website for which to retrieve domain information.
